description: Design mobile bags and cases that better meet the needs and lifestyles of mobile professionals like you. That's the SOLO mission, and it informs every aspect of our business. The SOLO Storm Collection is for those who seek timeless design and proven organization. The SOLO Storm Collection Universal Tablet Sling features a padded pocket that protects your iPad, tablet or eReader up to 10.2 inches. A front zippered pocket provides easy access to cell phones or other personal items while an additional front zip-down organizer holds other necessities. The adjustable sling strap can be clipped for left or right side use. SOLO offers new freedom to create your own work space, any time and any place. Get the satisfaction, comfort  and confidence that come with knowing that you’ve found the "perfect bag" for you.
title: Solo Storm Collection Universal 10-Inch Tablet Sling (STM751-4)
